name: Quantum Quest: Merge Dungeon
description:
Try out the trial version of Merge Dungeon.

You can try the full version on Kongregate, where we have included hotkeys, cloud saves, and tons of content!

https://www.kongregate.com/games/madmikedeangelo/quantum-quest-merge-dungeon

We're planning on exploring new platforms soon.  Keep an eye out!
